channel.title: Not recgonzied?
channel.description:
Ok when i try to run my server or client i get this "C:/program files/ is not recgonzied as an enternal or external command.... The info in my run.bat and client are as follows AND YES I HAVE THE NEWEST JAVA
Server:@echo off title Raz0rScape C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin
Client:@echo off title Raz0rscape Client cd Javac start Javac -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
If anyone can help and tell me what im supoosed to have it would be sooooo appreciated!!!! :confused: :confused: :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2009, 03:13:53 pm[/size][hr]O COME ON SOMONE HELP ME OUT IM GIVING OUT STAFF ON MY SERVER WANTS ITS UP...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2009, 03:15:42 pm[/size][hr]If you help ill also rep....

item.title: Not recgonzied?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

Ok when i try to run my server or client i get this "C:/program files/ is not recgonzied as an enternal or external command… The info in my run.bat and client are as follows
AND YES I HAVE THE NEWEST JAVA

Server:@echo off
title Raz0rScape
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin

Client:@echo off
title Raz0rscape Client
cd Javac
start Javac -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

If anyone can help and tell me what im supoosed to have it would be sooooo appreciated!!!
